value:
My homeland, Ilia, is so cold—and I
mean COLD. This place is a real
hothouse in comparison.

I have two sisters named Thea and
Juno. They're older than me. Guess
that makes me the youngest!

Want to chat? Sure! What d'ya
feel like talking about? How about...?
Hmm. Or maybe...? Nah.

You're welcome to ride my pegasus
anytime. Flying is the best!

Are you going to scold me for flying
too far ahead of the front lines?
Sorry, sorry—I can't help it!

Oh, $Nu?$k$pGreat! It is you! One of your friends
asked me to say hi. You remember
$Nf, right?

Yeah! I bet I could beat any
enemy now.

Hee hee! I'll be as good as my
sisters soon!

I'll never NOT be a trainee if
I can't do better than that.

I won't be a pegasus knight in
training for much longer!

I'm Shanna from Ilia! I'm a pegasus
knight! Well...sorta? I'm actually
still in training, but I'll do my best!

Some people say I'm childish.
Not nice to say, but maybe not
totally wrong either.$k$pBut since I've come here and
fought alongside everyone, I feel
like I've grown up a lot!$k$pHey, and here you are, I bet,
thinking that ol' Shanna looks
just the same, right?$k$pHow do I know? Oh, I know.
Everyone always looks at me
like I'm just the same.$k$pLooky there—it's Shanna!
And there—it's Shanna!$k$pThe thing is, I like being me.
So I wouldn't mind putting off
this whole growing-up thing.$k$pThat is, if you don't mind. Ha!
I knew you wouldn't!
えーいっ！
たぁっ！
きゃああっ！
Meanie!
Here we go!
Attack, attack!
Fine, fine! Everything's fine!
Not gonna lose!
Sorry...
Ahahaha
Hmm? Need something? You name it...and I'm on it!
AHH! Whew. Just you.
Hey, it's the chief! You're the chief, right? Right!
Hope you're not skipping meals, Chief! Bad idea!
My homeland is SO cold...
Someday...I'm gonna fly high and light up the sky!
Say! We should visit my homeland! You gotta meet the REAL chief!
Yep?
Got it!
Let's go!
